methods.name: public void resize(@IntRange(from = 0) int newSize)
methods.comment:
* Changes the size of this ByteArray. If this ByteArray is shrinked, the backing array
         * capacity is unchanged.

methods.name: public void append(byte value)
methods.comment: * Appends the specified value to the end of this array.

methods.name: private void ensureCapacity(@IntRange int count)
methods.comment: * Ensures capacity to append at least count values.

methods.name: public void clear()
methods.comment: * Removes all values from this array.

methods.name: public void clearWithReleasingLargeArray()
methods.comment:
* Removes all values from this array and release the internal array object if it is too
         * large.

methods.name: public byte get(@IntRange(from = 0) int index)
methods.comment: * Returns the value at the specified position in this array.

methods.name: public void set(@IntRange(from = 0) int index, byte value)
methods.comment: * Sets the value at the specified position in this array.

methods.name: public int size()
methods.comment: * Returns the number of values in this array.

methods.name: public byte[] getRawArray()
methods.comment:
* Returns internal raw array.
         *
         * Note that this array may have larger size than you requested.
         * Use size() instead for getting the actual array size.

methodNames: public void set(@IntRange(from = 0) int index, byte value)
